name: Know it All
summary: Your knowledge of abstruse topics is unparalleled.
description:
Your knowledge of abstruse topics is unparalleled. When you succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a Knowledge check, at the GM's discretion you might gain even more additional information or context than normal.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
